pr_title: [KOGITO-1887] - Pull request template for kogito-runtimes repository

timeline.message: [KOGITO-1887] - Pull request template for kogito-runtimes repository

timeline.bodyText:
you can save 2 chars by not using the [ and ] it is helpful sometimes and JIRA link works fine anyway ;)
just my 2c
timeline.author: tarilabs
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,11 @@
+Many thanks for submitting your Pull Request :heart:! 
+
+Please make sure that your PR meets the following requirements:
+
+- [ ] You have read the [contributors guide](https://github.com/kiegroup/droolsjbpm-build-bootstrap/blob/master/README.md)
+- [ ] Pull Request title is properly formatted: `[KOGITO-XYZ] Subject`
